summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6067 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Hansen View Addition, being the alley between 35th Avenue Southwest and 36th Avenue Southwest from West Hudson Street to West Dawson Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83092, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof agaisnt the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
